attributes.action: i  would like to see tougher sentancing of causing and allowing the death of a child
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
how many other children have to die before this goverment give higher sentancing for this law.
its not working as a deterant,infact more babies and children are dieing because of abuse.
please allow the courts to give higher sentance for this crime so justice is seen to be done
